revised_title: On the Secular Inequalities in Terrestrial Climates and Their Dependence on the Perihelion Longitude and Eccentricity of the Earth's Orbit
tldr: The author investigates the impact of secular inequalities in terrestrial climates due to the perihelion longitude and eccentricity of the Earth's orbit. By analyzing the temperature differences between the northern and southern hemispheres, the author provides insights into the effects of these inequalities on climate during geological periods.
